<<<<<<< HEAD
The ladies triall Acted by both their Majesties Servants at the private house in Drury Lane. Ford, John, 1586-ca. 1640.
[80] p.
Printed by E[dward] G[riffin] for Henry Shephard, and are to be sold at his shop in Chancery-lane at the signe of the Bible, between Sarjants Inne and Fleet-street, neare the Kings-head taverne, London : 1639.
Dedication signed: Iohn Ford. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-K⁴. The first leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
=======

Dedication signed: Iohn Ford. Printer's name from STC. Signatures: A-K⁴. The first leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
